page.title: 07Hurworth then and now.......
page.content: Hurworth used to be very small.There were only a few roads.Nearly all of the people knew each other.There was once a bus that went round called the Gas Bag.At school the boys were in one playground and the girls in another. There were 18-20 children in a class. For punishment they would be hit on the knuckles with a ruler.They used to dance round the maypole on the green and if they did they got a badge or spoon.On a Saturday everybody would have a wash then have a good supper as their treat.At home the girls couldn't get changed in front of the boys and vice versa.There wasn't a bathroom in the house so they got washed in a room in the yard.The girls slept with their mum and the boys with their dad.
